# Exercise 1

## a.
```{r}
CTL_unif <- function(n,m){
  # Use replicate to generate n samples, each consisting of m draws from U(0, 1)
  sample_means <- replicate(n, mean(runif(m)))
  
  # Return the vector of sample means
  return(sample_means)
}
  
```
